mapper.sql: t.id, t.title, t.description, t.level, t.kind, t.teacher_id as "teacherId", t.year, t.select_flag as "selectFlag", su.name as "studentName"
mapper.select: SELECT FROM graduation_title t LEFT JOIN sys_user su on su.id = t.student_id WHERE t.id = #{id, jdbcType=NUMERIC}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM graduation_title WHERE id = #{id, jdbcType=NUMERIC} AND teacher_id = #{teacherId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
